title: Apatite Config
description: Defines the configuration parameters and schedules for the Apatite instance.

config.description: Contains the settings for customizing the Apatite instance.

forceThemeMode.description: Specifies the theme mode to use, overriding the browser's preferred color scheme, when Apatite is in fallback mode.

customCSS.description: Specifies custom CSS to be applied for theming when Apatite is in fallback mode.

schedules.description: Array of schedules provided by the user for processing.

name.description: Schedule name for use in the UI

dateRangeValid.description: Specifies the date range during which the schedule is valid. If not provided, the schedule is assumed to be always valid.

reoccurrence.description: Defines the frequency of schedule repetition. For example, a schedule can be set to repeat only on weekdays (Monday to Friday).

type.description: Type of reoccurrence, whether daily (select days of week), monthly (select days of month), or yearly (select days of the year)

value.description: Specifies the zero indexed value for the reoccurrence
